speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Andreas Schwab, on behalf of the Committee on Petitions, on the annual report on the European Ombudsman’s activities in 2005 ( 2006/2117(INI) ) ( A6-0309/2006 ).
original: President. The next item is the report by Andreas Schwab, on behalf of the Committee on Petitions, on the annual report on the European Ombudsman’s activities in 2005 ( 2006/2117(INI) ) ( A6-0309/2006 ).
